p: In general, DMC was found to be active against many cancer cell lines with different magnitude of cytotoxicity. The chalcone exhibited the strongest cytotoxicity against A549 cells with an IC 50 value of 2.3 ± 0.44 μM. DMC was also very active against a variety of cancer cell lines with IC 50 ranging from 8 to 15 μM, such as HepG2, ASK, P-388, and PANC-1. For other cancer cell lines, DMC only showed moderate activities (IC 50 30–85 μM).
